org.wickedsource.logunit.log4j

Class LogUnitLog4jConsoleAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      • org.apache.log4j.WriterAppender
        • org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
          • org.wickedsource.logunit.log4j.LogUnitLog4jConsoleAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class LogUnitLog4jConsoleAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
    A LogUnit-aware Log4J ConsoleAppender. Configure Log4J with this appender to allow LogUnit to listen on log events and thus to enable unit testing of log output.
    Author:
    hombergs
